name: Achromatopsia (Nouhi)
description:
• This game was created for the Mini Jam #111 under the theme "Colors" under the limitation "You are your own Enemy".
  • The game was created in less than 24 hours due to lack of time.
  • This game is definitely not polished and potentially entails lots of bugs.
